title: TDR - Trade Duty Refund | Jason Cooper's Profile
description: Check Jason's details and schedule a chat to find out how much TDR can make you save on your reverse logistics budget.
bio: Jason Cooper is an experienced Business Development professional with a strong track record in e-commerce, logistics, and supply chain solutions. With extensive experience in international trade and customs compliance, Jason brings valuable expertise to help businesses navigate complex cross-border commerce challenges and optimize their duty management strategies.
skills: <ul class="interline"><li><strong>International Trade & Customs</strong>; Jason specializes in understanding global trade regulations, tariffs, and customs compliance across the EU, UK, and US markets. His expertise helps businesses minimize duty costs and streamline international shipping operations.</li><li><strong>E-Commerce Logistics</strong>; With deep knowledge of cross-border e-commerce operations, Jason guides businesses through complex logistics networks, helping them optimize reverse logistics and duty refund strategies.</li><li><strong>Business Development</strong>; Jason excels at identifying growth opportunities, building strategic partnerships, and developing solutions tailored to each client's unique trade and logistics challenges.</li></ul>
geo: Jason's expertise covers the EU, UK, and US markets. He is located in the UK.
languages: Jason is a native English speaker.
